name: A.I. Space Corps
description: A.I. Space Corps is a top-down space shooter, telling a new story of mankinds struggle against the merciless A.I. machines ruling over the universe.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: Intel or AMD 2.0-3.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb, Directx 9.0c SM 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel/AMD 3.0+ GHz Quad Core or Greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Nvidia GT/GTS or ATI Radeon HD Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes:

reviews.review_text: Boring... boring as hell.... the graphic is nice but the gameplay is poor and there is no depth in this game. After an 1 hour I wanted to sleep on my keyboard from boredom. Avoid like... boredom
